entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
